column1: You can type 'move' and a cardinal direction (north, south, east, west…Also up and down)
You can type 'look' and then a noun (some options are weapon, player, inventory)
You can type 'attack' and then the monsters name (hint use look before attacking)
You can type 'equip' then weapon name to equip a weapon from your inventory (hint use look inventory first)
You can type 'use' and a potion name (does not work at the moment)
You can type ' location' to find your current location
You can type 'save' to save your current progress
You can type 'quit' to exit the game
